thread.title: Jennifer Browne
thread.title_full: Pimlico Plumbers reviewed by Jennifer Browne

author: Jennifer Browne
title: Jennifer Browne
text: I rang Pimlico plumbers on Wednesday morning to report an ongoing roof problem. Perry came the next day at 8am, worked all day and completed the job by the end of the day. An excellent,reliable service from a workman who was a pleasure to have in the house. I always find it better to turn to Pimlico Plumbers as a first rather than a last resort. It saves a lot of hassle.
